trans-unit.source: pyinfra automates/provisions/manages/deploys infrastructure super fast at massive scale. It can be used for ad-hoc command execution, service deployment, configuration management and more. Core design features include:
trans-unit.target: pyinfra automates/provisions/manages/deploys infrastructure super fast at massive scale. It can be used for ad-hoc command execution, service deployment, configuration management and more. Core design features include:

trans-unit.source: pyinfra automates/provisions/manages/deploys infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: pyinfra automates/provisions/manages/deploys infrastructure.

trans-unit.source: pyinfra can be installed via pip:
trans-unit.target: pyinfra can be installed via pip:

trans-unit.source: ❗️ Two stage process that enables --dry runs before executing any changes.
trans-unit.target: ❗️ Two stage process that enables --dry runs before executing any changes.

trans-unit.source: 💻 Agentless execution against SSH/Docker/subprocess/winrm hosts.
trans-unit.target: 💻 Agentless execution against SSH/Docker/subprocess/winrm hosts.

trans-unit.source: 📦 Extendable with any Python package as configured & written in standard Python.
trans-unit.target: 📦 Extendable with any Python package as configured & written in standard Python.

trans-unit.source: 🔌 Integrated with Docker, Vagrant/Mech & Ansible out of the box.
trans-unit.target: 🔌 Integrated with Docker, Vagrant/Mech & Ansible out of the box.

trans-unit.source: 🚀 Super fast execution over thousands of hosts with predictable performance.
trans-unit.target: 🚀 Super fast execution over thousands of hosts with predictable performance.

trans-unit.source: 🚨 Instant debugging with stdout & stderr output on error or as required (-v|-vv|-vvv).
trans-unit.target: 🚨 Instant debugging with stdout & stderr output on error or as required ( -v | -vv | -vvv ).
